Plot: While subjected to the horrors of World War II Germany, young Liesel finds solace by stealing books and sharing them with others. In the basement of her home, a Jewish refugee is being protected by her adoptive parents.
Title: The Book Thief
Writer: Markus Zusak (based on the novel by), Michael Petroni (screenplay)
Actors: Roger Allam, Sophie Nélisse, Heike Makatsch, Julian Lehmann
tomatoConsensus: A bit too safe in its handling of its Nazi Germany setting, The Book Thief counters its constraints with a respectful tone and strong performances.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 14 nominations.
